title: Cowboys Don't Stay
description:
A Cowboy's Christmas Wish
Noah Tanner had taken more hard knocks on the rodeo circuit than he cared to count, but nothing had ever thrown him for a loop like this! A chance encounter brought him face-to-face with Tess Montgomery�and the child he never knew he had.Now, after eight years of life on the road, he felt a hankering to settle down. Noah's cowboy luck hadn't failed him yet�and he'd make sure Tess saw that all he wanted was to spend this, and every Christmas to come, with her and their daughter….
author: Anne McAllister
